name: Apocalypse Rangers
description:
"Apocalypse Rangers" is a 3D open-world twin-stick shooter RPG that was awarded with the 3rd place for the online games category in the Milan University event of 2020.

It's a multiplayer experience that heavily encourages cooperation between players through its mechanics and enemies' design. This game is inspired by the Monster Hunter series paradigm but transported in a different genre and with a different target.
